mil7.6.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘ulukassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.6.5:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, uluko kakehi pativiruddho, rattim kakasangham gantva bahupi kake hanati;
mil7.6.5:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena annanena pativiruddho katabbo, ekena raho nisiditva annanam sampamadditabbam, mulato chinditabbam.
mil7.6.5:1.4: Idam, maharaja, ulukassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.5:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, uluko suppatisallino hoti;
mil7.6.5:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena patisallanaramena bhavitabbam patisallanaratena.
mil7.6.5:2.3: Idam, maharaja, ulukassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.5:3.1: ‘Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patisallanaramo patisallanarato “idam dukkhan”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam dukkhasamudayo”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam dukkhanirodho”ti yathabhutam pajanati, “ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada”ti yathabhutam pajanati’”ti.
